reviews.sentence: Nice hotel between flights. Five minutes walk from Terminals E F Free shuttle every half an hour around the clock. Easy to get to the city by Airoexpres. Or take bus 651 it stops right in front of the Park Inn entrance. The hotel staff is very friendly and acomodating. I arrived 6 hours before official admittance time and got the room immediately for no extra charge. The room is basic but clean. Reliable free WiFi. Bathroom toiletries consist of two dispensers one for hands the other for the rest of you. Climate control is good. Small grocery shop booth in front. Overall the hotel provides all a traveller needs between flights with long connection time. I recommend it. If you came to Moscow for several days find a hotel downtown. What can one do at the airport hotel. Get drunk bored take a stroll between terminals.
Not worth its price. Pretty nice staff. Almost impossible to catch the shuttle bus. The room smelled like beer.

Good hotel but difficult to access. The hotel is a standard airport hotel good for a 1 night sleep before an early flight. Rooms are clean restaurant downstairs is good. I landed at terminal D and while there is 1 sign in the terminal towards the hotel shuttle. once you are outside there is no signage or even dedicated stop. I wandered around wanted to go back into the terminal to ask but was prevented to as you can not enter the arrival hall once you are outside for security reasons luggage gets scanned upon entering the terminal and that is only available at the departures level one level up. So I gave up and decided to walk to the hotel but around the airport it is a maze with highways underpasses etc. It took me 30 minutes to get there crossing at the most irresponsible spots. Had a lot of luggage which made this even less enjoyable. The poor signage is a big problem and takes away from any felt comfort once you have arrived at the hotel itself. On the way back the shuttle worked fine catching it from in front of the hotel.

Great location and price while in transit. Free shuttle to airport. Clean quiet and efficient staff. I did not know how to get there from the airport. Getting off the Aeroexpres it would have been great to have some directions to the shuttle location. Take the first elevator you find to level one. If you exit the building there you will walk to the left around the hotel in front of you. You will see the Park Inn on the opposite side. It is a quick walk.

A good place for an overnight stay at the airport. Location could walk to and from the airport. Very quiet could not hear any aircraft noise. The food in the restaurant. There was no English on the ATM but one of the reception staff was very helpful an came and helped me get some money. It was difficult to find the shuttle bus stop.

Very good. The hotel is clean and close to the airport. The rooms are comfy. Having read other peoples comments about the lack of clarity for access to the hotel I asked for clarification. I received a plan with the different stops from the shuttle. it was stated that the shutdown was at the departures from the airport. after 2 phone calls at the hotel as the shuttle did not pass it as been advised to me to come on foot.

an unpleasant experience ever. A warm room. I was going to take the shuttle bus to SVO airport. But I misunderstood the location of shuttle bus stop and missed first bus. So I waited outside in order to take next bus because I did not want to miss the bus again. However the next bus did not come on the time because of a problem with the wheel. But the employee did not let me know about the delay of the shuttle bus even though I was waiting outside in this freezing weather. That was a very unpleasant experience ever. PS the bath room smelled really bad.

Very convenient transit option. Hotel located just at the terminal Sheremetyevo Airport. There is a shuttle bus but it takes 15 minutes and if you walk it is just 5 minutes. I got a room from the renovated part there was everything you need including 2 bottles of water for free. If you wish they could include dinner into the price of your room. Beer a bit expensive. I was promised speedy Internet due to higher price but it was rather slow. And the ladies at the reception were very friendly and helpful.

Great breakfast nearby the airport. Very good breakfast. Restaurant opens 24 hours from 5 amThe shuttle bus from the airport does not have time table. One has to wait 30 min under extremely cold outside.
Near airport. near airport have shutle bus every 30 mins or can walk to the airport terminal E around 10 mins.

affordable good location but very noisy due to flights. It was located very close to the airport Even it was possible to go to the airport by walk. they gave us airport limousine service. it was good for customers. It was very very noisy coz of the many flights. I already thought about it before i decided to stay here. but it was worse than my expected. But if somebody needs to stay here for short night to get flight. it is not a fault of the hotel we should admit the environment.

First room was dated with broken ac and hearing that would not turn off on a 25C day. Finally got moved to a newer but smaller room which was much better. Staff was helpful but there was a bit of a language barrier to contend with. Shuttle to airport was punctual and frequent. Overall would stay again.

Pleasant. Ideally location near to Shermetyevo airport no need for 15 hour taxi from town to airport waking up breakfast than short walk to terminal. Terrible smell from kitchen probably in the lobby probably from kitchen the same one in the morining.

A good place to stay close to the airport. Very close to the airport. A shuttle is available from all the terminals to the hotel the stop is easy to find but it is really close enough to walk. it is a chain hotel so it has everything you had expect. A comfortable place to stay if you arrive late or leave early. An earlier breakfast would have been nice. Most people stay at this hotel because they have an early start so they miss breakfast even when it is included.
Excellent. Great location close to airport. Friendly staff. Brilliant breakfast.

Airport hotel accessible by shuttle bus only. It was a one night stopover stay. The stay is normal but reaching the hotel was a bit tricky. By just looking at the map the hotel was just 500 60 m away from Terminal D so we thought it ’s walkable. But when we went outside the airport we found that there were only highways in the front and no passenger walkways at all. So we dropped the idea of walking to the hotel and decided to go back to the airport information counter to ask for direction but the security guard prohibited us from re entering the airport. Originally he refused to speak with us in English Fortunately he finally used his limited English to tell us the hotel shuttle bus stop was located at aisle 75 outside the airport at which we caught the 30min frequency bus. It was a 5 8 min ride to the hotel from Terminal D as there was a lot of highways. On the next day when we leave the hotel to airport we found that it ’s walkable to Terminal F in 5 min by passing through the Aeroexpres train terminal which is right next to the hotel building. Given the hotel shuttle bus is free it ’s better and easier to use the shuttle bus to go between airport and hotel.
Very Good. Good value for money. Has a free shuttle every thirty minutes. Located right outside the airport perfect for layovers. Clean. Couldn’t really figure out the ACSmal room.
Stayed for a conference at the main Radison Location. Broken gym equipment.

Short stay after long journey. This hotel offers great value for money and is a perfect location right next to the main terminals. However be careful of you are flying into the brand new terminal C as rather than being a 250 metre walk as the Web site says it becomes a 6 km taxi ride. No complaints with anything really. Food very good stayed on the 7th floor after upgrading and was pleased with size of room and a really nice shower and bathroom. Even the Internet was good.

It is very convenient. The hotel is very close to the airport. There are 2 ways you can get to the airport from the hotel. choice 1. walk about 150 metres and go through the Radison Blu Hotel. The second choice is a very regular free shuttle that takes you to Termnal D possibly others. Both work well. The main bonus is the proximity to the airport. The buffet dinner was not very good and quite expensive for a Buffet. There was very little choice it is not something I would have again. I would sugets walking the 150 metres and going into the concourse between the airport express and the security into the airport terminal. There are a few choices of places to eat there.
